statements: SELECT * FROM musicians ORDER BY musician_name ASC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre='Rock' ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre, musician_birthdate FROM musicians WHERE musician_birthplace='London';
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre='Pop' OR musician_genre='Jazz';
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthdate FROM musicians WHERE musician_birthdate < '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthdate FROM musicians WHERE musician_birthdate < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY musician_birthdate ASC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM musicians WHERE musician_birthplace = 'London' ORDER BY musician_name ASC, musician_genre DESC;
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre = 'Pop' AND musician_birthdate >= '1980-01-01' ORDER BY musician_name ASC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthplace FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre = 'Jazz' AND musician_birthplace = 'New York' ORDER BY musician_name DESC, musician_birthplace ASC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM discography WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT musician_id, album_title FROM discography ORDER BY musician_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM discography;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM musicians JOIN discography ON musicians.id = discography.musician_id WHERE discography.release_year > 2000;
SELECT name, artist.genre, discography.album_title FROM musicians AS artist INNER JOIN discography ON artist.id = discography.musician_id WHERE artist.genre = 'Pop';
SELECT musician_id, AVG(release_year) AS avg_release_year FROM discography GROUP BY musician_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(release_year) AS latest_release_year, MIN(release_year) AS oldest_release_year FROM discography;
SELECT musician_name FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_id FROM musicians;
SELECT release_year, album_name FROM discography;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM discography;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_id FROM musicians WHERE musician_id=1;
SELECT * FROM discography WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM discography WHERE musician_id=3 AND release_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS total_albums FROM genres JOIN discography ON genres.genre_id = discography.discography_id GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT song_name, song_length FROM songs WHERE song_length < 180;
SELECT artist_name, genre, bio FROM artists INNER JOIN artists_info ON artists.artist_id = artists_info.artist_id;
SELECT * FROM artists_info JOIN artists ON artists_info.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre='Pop' OR genre='Rock';
SELECT song_name, song_length FROM songs WHERE song_length >= 180 ORDER BY song_length DESC;
SELECT artist_name, album_name, song_name, song_length FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT song_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > '00:05:00';
SELECT * FROM tracks WHERE track_number < 10 ORDER BY track_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT song_name, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > '00:03:30';
SELECT track_number, song_name FROM tracks JOIN songs ON tracks.song_id = songs.song_id ORDER BY track_number ASC;
